body:
HackerRank will not be available due to scheduled maintenance from 10 PM to 11 PM PST on 10th February 2023 (See all timezones here). We will take this time to perform updates to our database.

During this time you will not be able to access the entire HackerRank platform including HackerRank for Work and HackerRank Community.

Frequently Asked Questions

How does this impact test candidates?

The tests interface will not be available during the maintenance window. Candidates will see a notification to come back at a later time if they try to launch a test. We will also ensure that candidates are allowed to start their test only if they can complete it before the start of the maintenance window.

How does this impact interview sessions?

New interview sessions cannot start during the maintenance window, and up to 90 minutes prior to the start of the window. For sessions that are live as we approach the window, we will show warnings to the participants so they can complete their interviews. Interview data recorded before the maintenance window starts will be safe.

How does this impact my reports?

You will not be able to view reports or dashboards during the downtime.

What happens to invites expiring on 10th Februrary?

For candidate test invites which expire on 10th February, we can increase the expiry date by a day in case you would want to do that. You can send out the consent at support@hackerrank.com

As always, if you have any questions, please email us at support@hackerrank.com and we would be more than happy to answer them.

Â
title: Scheduled Maintenance on 10-Feb-2023
